snippet.title: Moorhuhn Kart 4 | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Buckle up for our Official Moorhuhn Kart 4 Trailer! 🏎️💨
Moorhuhn Kart 4, coming 13 March 2025 to Steam, Nintendo Switch, PS4 and PS5, revives the thrill of kart racing with fresh tracks, hilarious items, and over-the-top challenges. 
Think you can take the lead? Watch now to get a glimpse of what’s in store!

Features:
🏁 12 new tracks: From jungle trails to Sven Bømwøllen’s Meadow.
🐔 8 playable characters: Fan favourites like Moorhuhn and Sven, plus newcomer Midnight the Bat.
🔸 12 hilarious items: Sabotage your rivals with the 16-tonne weight or other cheeky tricks.
🏎️ Customisable karts: Engine, tyres, body – your kart, your rules!
🎮 Local split-screen: Perfect for fast-paced couch fun with up to 4 players.
💻 Cross-platform multiplayer: Race online with up to 8 players.
🏆 Grand Prix and Single Player modes: For solo adventures with intense duels against AI.

✅ Wishlist on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3012980
👉 Stay up to date with all the latest news:
🔗 Visit us on our website: https://www.korion.de/en/
🔗 Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/korion.interactive/
🔗 Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/KorionGames
🔗 Join us on Twitter: https://x.com/KorionG
🔗 Check us out on Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/korion-interactive.bsky.social
🔗 Have a look at our TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@korion.interactive

Release Date: 13 March 2025
🗣️ Join our Discord Server to chat with us, share feedback, and find other players! 
🔗 https://discord.gg/j4HCKTYXqg

Don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe to stay tuned for more updates, trailers, and exclusive content leading up to the release! 🐔🏎️💨
